dataList.content: When fighting an Abnormality, focus on discovering its weaknesses and destroying its parts by attacking with effective Affinities.
Identities with certain Sins will have better odds at passing checks.
Some Abnormality skills can be canceled by breaking their parts. Breaking one at the right time can stop a powerful skill.
Make sure to collect your daily rewards and Egoshards from Mirror Dungeons to power up your Identities!
Take into account what E.G.O you bring when you build your team so that you can gather the necessary resources more easily.
E.G.O can shift the battle in your favor if used when your Sinners have enough Sanity.
If a Staggered character’s health falls below the next Stagger Threshold, they’ll take extra damage.
If you’re struggling to conquer a Story Dungeon, make sure to power up your Identities as best you can.
